sentences.english: And remember sometimes it is not the dream that is wrong, just the timing!
sentences.chinese: 记住，有时胡想自己并没有错，只是机会差池罢了。

sentences.english: I have a beautiful dream that is one day I can travel around the world.
sentences.chinese: 我有一个美丽的胡想，就是有一天可以环游全世界。

sentences.english: Many young girls dream of being afashelloon model.
sentences.chinese: 许多年轻女子胡想成为服装车模儿。

sentences.english: Today is your special day, a season when a dream would come true.
sentences.chinese: 明天是您的特别的日子，一个胡想成实的时节。

sentences.english: Sometimes! I need music to reduce off my own thoughts.
sentences.chinese: 有时刻，我须要音乐来禁绝自己痴心胡想。

sentences.english: Qing is a hardworking girl and very determined to turn her dream into reality.
sentences.chinese: 青是个很吃苦的女孩，一向执着于将胡想酿成实际。

sentences.english: My dream is to be a scientist.
sentences.chinese: 我的胡想是当一名科学家。

sentences.english: Two in three people have given up their dream of owning a home, research shows.
sentences.chinese: 调查显示，三分之二的英国人已经抛却买房胡想。
